variable.name: AGE_BIRTH_1
variable.description: Age first term pregnancy ended (term>=37th obstetric week) prior to index age

variable.name: FAMHx
variable.description: Indicator for whether the mother or another sister had breast cancer (prior to diagnosis of affected sister)

variable.name: AGE_DIAG
variable.description: Age at diagnosis of participating case
variable.comment: Age at diagnosis, in completed years.

variable.name: INDEX_AGE
variable.comment: Minimum of ages at controls' completion of CATI2 and age at diagnosis of the participating case.

variable.name: BIRTH_ORDER
variable.comment: This is needed because by design cases were under 50 at diagnosis but their control sister(s) could be much older.

variable.name: MEN_STATUS
variable.description: Menopausal status at index age (pre, post, earlier hysterectomy with ovarian tissue retained)
variable.comment: Hysterectomy with ovarian tissue spared is a middle category
